Drum Pouch  $50

The pouch would not have contained a card, but still is a cool companion piece to the T206 set.

Pictures can be seen in my For Sale Album here on net54 here:
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/album.php?albumid=63[/url]

I would also consider trades for E cards of hall of famers or Delongs that I need.  If you have any questions please ask.

Thank you for looking

I will take the cycle back. my email [url]coe.biggers@gmail.com[/url].
  thanks Coe
Bumping this one to the top.  Thanks for looking
